replies.body:
Client lags occasionally not allowing me to accept any invites, lobbies are bugging and i reset my client several times to try and fix that and it kind of works but problem always returns... I dont know what it is but it is happening since this patch for me and my friends...
EUNE
from Serbia
There is a server issue with EUNE at this moment, but our network team is looking into it now.  Hang tight!
I am having notification that i am not accepting too many games and it is telling me that i will get some pennalty if i will not stop not accepting games what should i do
When you queue up for a match, make sure to accept those matches if you ever intend on playing. If you keep declining them, it can make it take longer for other people to find matches.
When will it be when eune will be okay if i can ask ?
Looks like the [service status](http://status.leagueoflegends.com/#na) page has been updated.  Is everything okay now?
client is saying we are unable to log you in because you may be offline
This patch has so many bugs and lags! I couldn't lock in! Next game when it found match it didn't load into the champ select! Fix it fast

Lagging out of champion select or not being able to load into matches successfully both tend to point towards an issue with your connection being unstable. Check out the points on port forwarding and how to configure your DNS servers over in our [**connection guide**](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201752664-Troubleshooting-Connection-Issues) and let me know if that helps you get into games smoother.

Hello guys, maybe someone could help with my issue.

SO basicly what is going on is that im starting game and everything looks fine. I go to PVP start game, picking my champion, locking in, and then something goes wrong. Window opens where you can see all champs ( loading screen ) and it begins to go dark, it looks like window is going up and down up and down. Some time i ran into a problem where my pc need to restart it self. Some times i get into the game but after 2-3 minutes same thing happends, my game starts to shut down and come back up constantly.

I dont understand what happend. i have re installed windows and few other things but nothing helps. Window still getting dark and gets back up until my pc run into restart.

That sounds pretty frustrating, and a pretty strange issue.  There could be other driver or hardware issues causing this, definitely make sure to update your drivers after the OS reinstall.  Our [FPS issues](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201752684-Low-Frame-Rate-FPS-Troubleshooting) guide can help with that.

Should the issue persist, stick to custom games for now and reach out to us in a [support ticket](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/requests/new) so our tech team can investigate this with you individually.  Download our [hextech repair tool](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/224826367) as well to grab some logs, and attach it to your ticket to get more context.  See you there!
why it shows me I'm inactive in rank, and I play rank almost everyday~~~I am worried about it~. Does someone have same issue as me?
What do you mean by inactive as rank?  Where exactly are you seeing that?  As long as you're playing ranked you should be fine, and you won't experience ranked decay unless past Gold.

I am plat now, and I know what you mean by playing ranked I should be fine. However, it occurs when I login to the League of Legends. It displays like that I have not play ranked for a couple months, and shows me I will get decay in couple days, but I actually play ranked almost everyday.
So, it is weird. Hope you can understand my issue.

Remember that there's more than one ranked queue! That decay message is probably for a different queue like 3v3 or Flex so make sure to play a match in each queue that you're ranked high enough for decay to kick in.
Thanks, I get it. I totally forget about flex rank.

It says that I will get decay in next 6 days. I am really worried about it.
hope you can fix that soon.
It shows me the inactive notification every time when I login into my account, and I actually played ranked.{{champion:1}}

Constant client crashes. client simply wont open, and if it does, it needs to be force quit on my macbook because it will instantly be "not responding" status.

Also in the game, it kicks me off saying its trying to reconnect even though there are no issues with my internet.

i tried to patch but i got error 002 :(
[](https://prnt.sc/growqw)
i have more than 8 gb :/

Those 002 errors are a good sign that some of the game files are probably corrupted. Try the steps in the image below and it should force a repatch to get those files working again. Let me know if this doesn't work for some reason!

https://i.gyazo.com/fbe5976243158ecce7efef172951e219.png
I got inst banned after 1 game but my adc fed and afk can you guys fix the banning system please

My game seems to lag quite a bit recently.  We haven't changed anything with our internet, but playing in the most recent patch I get upwards of 600ms ping spikes whenever more than 2 champions are on the screen.  I've tried lowering all my settings, but that doesn't seem to help.  Any ideas what might be causing this or things for me to try?
(NA)
I've tried to play a few games and so far I haven't had any problems.
This was likely caused by the recent EUNE issues, but everything should be fine now.  Let me know if otherwise!
Need direct download link for a pre installed lol my internet is not good

Yes, please guys bring back the resume capability. It existed in the old patches. I am not able download 15 gb all at once... and whenever something happens (router restarts, electricity cuts..) the download goes back to 0% 

https://i.imgur.com/zIJ0CYM.png

You can try transferring a league folder into a thumb-drive and into your PC, built the patcher may read the game files as corrupt.  There's no pre-install beyond our [download link ](https://signup.na.leagueoflegends.com/en/signup/redownload)which connects to the patching server.

My game just ended out of nowhere. I was playing a normal draft pick and all of a sudden i get disconnected and the game ends. I can frelly queque up for new games and the game doesnt appear in my match history!!!

I'm not currently seeing any issues on EUW, so I'm curious if a local or ISP issue might be getting in the way here.  When you get a chance, download [WinMTR](http://winmtr.net/winmtr-v0-92-now-available/) and run a traceroute to 192.64.170.252 for about 5 minutes.  Remove the first two columns of IPs, and let me know what you find.

ColorBlind Singed Poison is now not Blue?
Is this a glitch with the Colorblind Mode or are Colorblind Players now just unable to deal with Singed since his Poison is the same color as the grass.

I don't believe this is intended. Green on green doesn't exactly help those who are colorblind see any better at all. I've passed this along so that we can get some hands on this and get it fixed soon hopefully!
I thought i had a problem with my client and i reinstalled it 4 times and when i thought it was fixed i waited in a lobby for 32 minutes than it crashed http://prntscr.com/gqhidr.

It looks like there might have been a couple EUNE server issues around the time you were playing. Let's go ahead and run a quick repair through the client options just in case some of those game files were damaged, and let me know if you've been able to get back into games yet or not.

http://prntscr.com/gqk8t5

and after that i restart the client and this happens : http://prntscr.com/gqkafj

i never decline always accept....

Hello, I am still not able to play a game for the last 7 hours now. I have done the new update patch, and when I try to create a ranked game it doesnt letm e click on confirm, sometimes if it does, i click accept and nothing happens, and I also received a 5 minute penalty because the client bugged and kicked me out of the game , but I had chosen a champ it just didnt let me lock it. Please help me! Fix this.

I think it is only an EUNE bug problem whatever you want to call it. WTH!! fix it!  I dont know what to do. this happens since the patch for me and all my friends too
I wonder what gave it away that EUNE has a server problem?
Well it certainly is weird when it happens to a considerable amount of players but not to all of them. maybe its a transistor? XP
nooo shit ???.....
